Name: Small room
Description: You are in a small sparse windowless room. In a corner is a broken bed, and to the east you see a door.

Name: Basement
Description:
You see an old damp basement strewn about with junk. To the north is a set of stairs leading up.
To the south is a heavy security door marked with a purple triangle.

Name: Hallway
Description: You are in a remarkably unremarkable hallway. You see stairs leading down to the south, and doors leading east and north.

Name: Study
Description: You are in a stuffy study. The air in this room reeks of the smell of mold and mildew from the myriad of books covering the bookshelves. You see doors leading to the north and to the west.

Name: Kitchen
Description: A large, now abandoned, kitchen in complete disarray. You see doors leading in all directions.

Name: Storage Room
Description: This small room has been used to store a variety of goods for use in the kitchen.

Name: Dining Room
Description: Before you is an elegant dining room, with two long tables prepared for a dinner worthy of high society. It does not appear as if anyone has used it in a long time. You see doors leading in all directions. The northern door is green.

Name: Bathroom
Description: You are in a bathroom that has not been properly cleaned in a long time. You see a door to the west.

Name: Entry hallway
Description: You are in a remarkably unremarkable hallway. You see doors leading to the north, south and east.

Name: Living Room
Description: As you look around, you find a well-lit and kempt living room. In a corner you see an old man with a long beard dressed in a purple suit. You see doors to the south and the west.

Name: Foyer
Description: The foyer you are in is in complete disrepair. Where the entrance to the building would be is a massive pile of rubble. You only see the door you came from.

Name: Clothing Storage
Description: This is a clothing storage. You see a door to the east.

Name: Upper hallway
Description: This is a hallway. You see doors leading in all directions.

Name: Bedroom
Description: This is a bedroom. You see a door to the west.

Name: Guest bedroom
Description: This is a guest bedroom. You see a door to the east.

Name: Master bedroom
Description: This is the master bedroom. You see a door to the south.

Name: Outside
Description: You have managed to escape the house, congratulations!
